description.spanish: Has encontrado tu primer recuerdo de la tripulación de la Beira D
description.schinese: 找到了第一个跟D号贝拉钻井平台有关的纪念品
description.tchinese: 已找到與D號貝拉鑽井平臺員工有關的第一個紀念品
description.russian: Найдите первую памятную вещь, связанную с экипажем «Бейры Д»
description.japanese: ベイラDのクルーに関連する最初の遺品を見つけた
description.brazilian: Encontre o primeiro item ligado à tripulação da Beira D

displayName.italian: Qui per fare il mio dovere

description.english: Find a significant number of Mementos left by the Beira D crew
description.german: Finde eine beträchtliche Menge von Andenken der Besatzung der Beira D
description.french: Trouvez un certain nombre de souvenirs de l'équipage de la Beira D
description.italian: Trova una quantità significativa di cimeli lasciati dall'equipaggio della Beira D
description.koreana: 베이라 D 선원이 남긴 상당한 수의 유품을 찾으세요
description.spanish: Has encontrado un número considerable de recuerdos de la tripulación de la Beira D
description.schinese: 找到D号贝拉钻井平台队员留下的大量纪念品
description.tchinese: 找到D號貝拉鑽井平臺員工留下的大量紀念品
description.russian: Найдите значительное количество памятных вещей, оставшихся от экипажа  «Бейры Д»
description.japanese: ベイラDのクルーが残した大量の遺品を見つけよう
description.brazilian: Encontre um número significativo de itens deixados pela tripulação da Beira D

description.english: "You were just trying to do right by me."
description.german: „Du hast dabei nur an mich gedacht.“
description.french: « Tu essayais juste de faire ce qu'il fallait pour moi. »
description.italian: "Volevi solo rimediare."
description.koreana: "내 옆에서 옳은 일을 하려던 거 알아."
description.spanish: "Sé que querías hacer lo correcto, por mí"
description.schinese: “你只是真心想为我好。”
description.tchinese: 「你只是不想對不起我。」
description.japanese: 「うちのことだけじゃなくて」
description.brazilian: "Você só estava tentando fazer o melhor por mim"

description.english: Find a very special room and remember a very special day
description.german: Finde einen sehr besonderen Raum und erinnere dich an einen sehr besonderen Tag
description.french: Trouvez une pièce très spéciale et souvenez-vous d'un jour mémorable
description.italian: Trova una stanza molto speciale e ricorda un giorno altrettanto speciale
description.koreana: 매우 특별한 방을 찾고 매우 특별한 날을 기념하세요
description.spanish: Encuentra una sala muy especial y rememora un día muy especial
description.schinese: 找到一个极为特殊的房间，铭记一个极为特殊的日子
description.tchinese: 找到一間非常特別的房間，想起一個非常特別的日子
description.russian: Найдите очень особенную комнату и вспомните очень особенный день
description.japanese: 特別な部屋を見つけて、特別な一日を思い出そう
description.brazilian: Encontre uma sala muito especial e lembre-se de um dia muito especial

displayName.tchinese: 老天，我真的需要抽根菸。
displayName.japanese: あー　タバコ吸いたか

description.english: Finally found that lighter of hers
description.german: Endlich ihr Feuerzeug gefunden
description.french: Trouvez enfin son briquet
description.italian: Finalmente hai trovato quell'accendino
description.spanish: Por fin has encontrado aquel mechero
description.schinese: 最终找到了她的那个打火机
description.tchinese: 終於找到了她的那個打火機
description.japanese: ようやく彼女のライターを見つけた
description.brazilian: Encontre aquele isqueiro dela finalmente

displayName.german: Ein auf den Kopf gestelltes Wrack

description.english: Find all the Mementos you can of the lost Beira D crew
description.german: Finde alle Andenken der verschwundenen Besatzung der Beira D
description.french: Trouvez tous les souvenirs possibles de l'équipage de la Beira D
description.italian: Trova quanti più cimeli possibili dell'equipaggio disperso della Beira D
description.koreana: 사라진 베이라 D 선원의 모든 유품을 찾으세요
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los recuerdos posibles de la tripulación perdida de la Beira D
description.schinese: 找到D号贝拉钻井平台所有遇难队员的纪念品
description.tchinese: 找到所有能找到的D號貝拉鑽井平臺失蹤員工的紀念品
description.russian: Найдите все возможные памятные вещи пропавшего экипажа «Бейры Д»
description.japanese: 失われたベイラDのクルーの遺品をすべて探しだそう
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os itens possíveis perdidos pela tripulação da Beira D

description.english: Follow the flickering flare down to the bottommost layer
description.german: Folge der flackernden Fackel nach unten bis zur untersten Ebene
description.french: Suivez la fusée éclairante jusqu'au plus profond
description.italian: Segui la torcia tremolante giù fino al livello più profondo
description.koreana: 깜빡이는 조명을 따라 가장 아래쪽 층까지 내려가세요
description.spanish: Sigue la bengala titilante hasta el estrato más profundo
description.schinese: 沿着闪烁的信号弹下到最底层
description.tchinese: 跟隨閃爍的火炬一直下到最底層
description.russian: Проследите за мерцающим факелом до самого нижнего уровня
description.japanese: 明滅するフレアをたどって一番下の層まで降りる
description.brazilian: Siga o sinalizador aceso até a camada mais inferior

description.english: Sink into the gaping bowels of the North Sea
description.german: Versinke in das klaffende Innere der Nordsee
description.french: Plongez dans les entrailles de la mer du Nord
description.italian: Lascia che le acque del Mare del Nord si richiudano su di te
description.spanish: Húndete en las entrañas del mar del Norte
description.schinese: 沉入北海那幽深的腹地之中
description.tchinese: 沉入北海的海底深淵
description.russian: Погрузитесь в зияющие глубины Северного моря
description.japanese: 北海の底に沈む
description.brazilian: Mergulhe nas partes profundas do Mar do Norte

description.english: Complete the game by sinking into the comforting embrace of what you sought all along
description.german: Schließe das Spiel ab, indem du in der tröstlichen Umarmung dessen versinkst, was du die ganze Zeit gesucht hast
description.french: Finissez le jeu dans les bras rassurants que vous cherchiez depuis toujours
description.italian: Completa il gioco sprofondando nel confortevole abbraccio di ciò che hai sempre cercato
description.koreana: 지금까지 계속 찾았던 존재의 따스한 포옹에 몸을 맡기며 게임을 완료하세요
description.spanish: Completa el juego hundiéndote en el seno de lo que siempre habías buscado
description.schinese: 沉入你一直以来追寻之物的怀抱，以此完成游戏
description.tchinese: 沉浸在你一直尋求的舒適懷抱中，完成遊戲
description.russian: Завершите игру, погрузившись в уютные объятия того, что вы искали все это время
description.japanese: ずっと探し求めていたものの心地よい抱擁に身を沈めてゲームを完了させる
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo afundando-se no abraço reconfortante daquilo que estava procurando esse tempo todo

displayName.german: So nah und doch so fern

description.english: Complete the game by finding what you sought... but then forcing your way back to the pain
description.german: Schließe das Spiel ab, indem du das findest, was du gesucht hast ... aber dann den Weg zurück zum Schmerz erzwingst
description.french: Terminez le jeu en trouvant ce que vous cherchiez... mais décidez d'accepter la douleur
description.italian: Completa il gioco trovando ciò che cercavi... per poi costringerti a tornare alla dura realtà
description.koreana: 지금까지 계속 찾았던 존재를 찾아 게임을 완료하고... 다시 고통 속으로 돌아가세요
description.spanish: Completa el juego encontrando lo que buscabas... para luego abrirte paso hasta el dolor
description.schinese: 找到你追寻的一切…却重返旧日之痛苦，以此完成游戏
description.tchinese: 找到你所尋找的東西……但隨後又被迫回到痛苦中，完成遊戲
description.russian: Завершите игру, найдя то, что вы искали... но затем заставив себя вернуться к боли
description.japanese: 探していたものを見つけてゲームを完了する…だがその後、無理やり苦痛へと逆戻りする
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo encontrando o que procurava… mas voltando para a parte dolorida no final

description.english: Forget your training and ascend too high, too fast
description.german: Vergiss dein Training und tauche zu schnell zu hoch auf
description.french: Oubliez votre formation et remontez trop haut, trop vite
description.italian: Dimentica l'addestramento e risali troppo velocemente e vicino alla superficie
description.koreana: 받았던 훈련을 잊고 수심을 급격하게 높이세요
description.spanish: Olvídate de lo que te han enseñado y asciende mucha altura precipitadamente
description.schinese: 忘记了训练，上升得过高过快
description.tchinese: 忘記你的訓練，上浮得太高太快
description.russian: Забудьте о тренировках и поднимитесь слишком быстро и высоко
description.japanese: 訓練を忘れて、あまりにも高く、速くのぼる
description.brazilian: Esqueça seu treinamento e suba alto e rápido demais

description.english: Run out of oxygen while off the umbilical
description.german: Lass deinen Sauerstoff ausgehen, während die Versorgungsleitung getrennt ist
description.french: Manquez d'oxygène alors que le câble ombilical est détaché
description.italian: Termina l'ossigeno mentre non hai l'ombelicale
description.koreana: 코드를 떼어놨을 때 산소를 전부 사용하세요
description.spanish: Quédate sin oxígeno tras desconectarte del cordón
description.schinese: 在脱离维生线缆时氧气耗尽
description.tchinese: 在離開臍帶式線纜的情況下耗盡氧氣
description.russian: Задохнитесь от недостатка кислорода, отсоединив шланг
description.japanese: アンビリカルが外れている間に酸素がなくなる
description.brazilian: Fique sem oxigênio enquanto estiver desconectada do umbilical

description.english: Permitted your current consciousness to join a greater whole
description.german: Ermögliche deinem aktuellen Bewusstsein, Teil eines größeren Ganzen zu werden
description.french: Laissez-vous engloutir corps et âme
description.italian: Hai permesso alla tua coscienza attuale di diventare un tutt'uno con qualcosa di più grande
description.koreana: 현재의 자아를 더욱 거대한 존재에 의탁하게 하세요
description.spanish: Haz que tu consciencia actual se una a un ser mayor
description.schinese: 允许你当前的意识融入更庞大的整体
description.tchinese: 允許你當前的意識加入一個更大的整體
description.russian: Позвольте своему сознанию слиться с чем-то большим
description.japanese: 現在の意識が、より大きな全体に加わることを受け入れた
description.brazilian: Permita que sua consciência atual ganhe outro patamar

description.english: Someday, some other saturation diver may come and find your remains
description.german: Eines Tages wird ein anderer Taucher deine Überreste finden
description.french: Un jour, un autre plongeur trouvera peut-être votre corps
description.italian: Prima o poi, durante un'immersione in saturazione, qualcuno ritroverà i tuoi resti
description.koreana: 언젠가 다른 포화 잠수부가 당신의 유해를 찾으러 올지도 모릅니다
description.spanish: Llegará el día en que otro buceador de saturación venga y se tope con tus restos
description.schinese: 终有一天，某个深潜者会出现并发现你的遗骸
description.tchinese: 也許某一天，其他飽和潛水夫會來尋找你的遺體
description.russian: Когда-нибудь другой водолаз, возможно, найдет ваши останки
description.japanese: いつか他の飽和潜水士がやってきて、あなたの遺体を見つけるかもしれない
description.brazilian: Um dia, pode ser que outro mergulhador venha e encontre seus restos mortais

displayName.japanese: 標準評価試験 ダイバー認定証

description.english: Thoroughly explore the sea floor
description.german: Den Meeresgrund gründlich absuchen
description.french: Explorez minutieusement le fond marin
description.italian: Esplora completamente il fondale
description.spanish: Explora el fondo marino de cabo a rabo
description.schinese: 彻底探索海床
description.tchinese: 徹底探索海底
description.japanese: 海底を徹底的に探索する
description.brazilian: Explore bem o leito do mar

description.english: Found your first set of human remains from the Beira D crew
description.german: Finde deine ersten menschlichen Überreste der Besatzung der Beira D
description.french: Trouvez la première dépouille de l'équipage de la Beira D
description.italian: Trova per la prima volta i resti di un membro dell'equipaggio della Beira D
description.koreana: 베이라 D 선원의 첫 유해를 찾으세요
description.spanish: Has encontrado tus primeros restos humanos de la tripulación de la Beira D
description.schinese: 找到了第一副D号贝拉钻井平台队员的遗骸
description.tchinese: 已找到與D號貝拉鑽井平臺員工的第一組遺骸
description.russian: Найдите первые человеческие останки, принадлежавшие члену экипажа «Бейры Д»
description.japanese: ベイラDのクルーの最初の遺体を発見した
description.brazilian: Encontre os primeiros restos mortais humanos da tripulação da Beira D

displayName.german: Müde bin ich, geh zur Ruh

description.english: Found a significant amount of human remains from the Beira D crew
description.german: Finde eine beträchtliche Menge von menschlichen Überresten der Besatzung der Beira D
description.french: Trouvez un certain nombre de dépouilles de l'équipage de la Beira D
description.italian: Trova numerosi resti di membri dell'equipaggio della Beira D
description.koreana: 베이라 D 선원의 유해 여러 개를 찾으세요
description.spanish: Has encontrado una cantidad considerable de restos humanos de la tripulación de la Beira D
description.schinese: 找到了大量D号贝拉钻井平台队员的遗骸
description.tchinese: 已找到與D號貝拉鑽井平臺員工的大量遺骸
description.russian: Найдите значительное количество человеческих останков, принадлежавших членам экипажа «Бейры Д»
description.japanese: ベイラDのクルーの遺体を大量に発見した
description.brazilian: Encontre uma quantidade significativa de restos mortais humanos da tripulação da Beira D

description.english: Found all the human remains from the Beira D crew that you can
description.german: Finde alle menschlichen Überreste der Besatzung der Beira D
description.french: Trouvez toutes les dépouilles possibles de l'équipage de la Beira D
description.italian: Trova quanti più resti possibili dei membri dell'equipaggio della Beira D
description.koreana: 찾을 수 있는 베이라 D 선원의 유해를 전부 찾으세요
description.spanish: Has encontrado todos los restos humanos posibles de la tripulación de la Beira D
description.schinese: 找到了D号贝拉钻井平台所有队员的遗骸
description.tchinese: 已找到所能找到的D號貝拉鑽井平臺員工的全部遺骸
description.russian: Найдите все возможные человеческие останки, принадлежавшие членам экипажа «Бейры Д»
description.japanese: ベイラDのクルーの遺体を可能な限りすべて見つける
description.brazilian: Encontre uma quantidade significativa de restos mortais humanos da tripulação da Beira D

description.english: Confirm for yourself that both escape routes failed the crew of the Beira D
description.german: Bestätige, dass beide Fluchtwege für die Besatzung der Beira D nicht funktioniert haben
description.french: Confirmez que les deux solutions de secours de l'équipage de la Beira D ont échoué
description.italian: Verifica che l'equipaggio non poté utilizzare nessuna delle due vie di fuga dalla Beira D
description.koreana: 베이라 D 선원의 탈출로 두 곳이 전부 실패로 돌아갔다는 사실을 확인하세요
description.spanish: Da fe de que a la tripulación de la Beira D le fallaron ambas rutas de escape
description.schinese: 亲自确认D号贝拉钻井平台队员的两条逃生路线均告失败
description.tchinese: 親自確認D號貝拉鑽井平臺員工的兩條逃生路線都失敗了
description.russian: Убедитесь сами, что оба пути эвакуации не помогли экипажу «Бейры Д»
description.japanese: ベイラD号のクルーがどちらの脱出ルートでも失敗したことを、自分の目で確認する
description.brazilian: Confirme para si mesma que as duas rotas de fuga falharam para a tripulação da Beira D

description.english: "You've never seen water like that." Spend some time back at home
description.german: „Du hast noch nie solches Wasser gesehen.“ Verbinge etwas Zeit zu Hause
description.french: « Tu verrais cette eau. Du jamais vu. » Passez un peu de temps chez vous
description.italian: "Non hai mai visto un'acqua così". Trascorri del tempo a casa
description.koreana: "이런 물은 본 적 없을 거야." 집에서 시간을 보내세요
description.spanish: "Seguro que nunca has visto agua así". Pasa tiempo en casa
description.schinese: “从未见过这样的海域。”在家里呆一段时间
description.tchinese: 「那是你從未看過的湖光山色。」回家度過一點時間
description.russian: «Ты такой воды в жизни не видел». Проведите некоторое время дома
description.japanese: 「あんな水、見た事ないだろう。」家に戻ってしばらく過ごす
description.brazilian: Passe um tempo de volta em casa ("Águas do tipo nunca vistas.")

description.english: Cuir crìoch air an sgeulachd le dùsgadh
description.german: Cuir crìoch air an sgeulachd le dùsgadh
description.french: Cuir crìoch air an sgeulachd le dùsgadh
description.italian: Cuir crìoch air an sgeulachd le dùsgadh
description.koreana: Cuir crìoch air an sgeulachd le dùsgadh
description.spanish: Cuir crìoch air an sgeulachd le dùsgadh
description.schinese: Cuir crìoch air an sgeulachd le dùsgadh
description.tchinese: Cuir crìoch air an sgeulachd le dùsgadh
description.russian: Cuir crìoch air an sgeulachd le dùsgadh
description.japanese: Cuir crìoch air an sgeulachd le dùsgadh
description.brazilian: Cuir crìoch air an sgeulachd le dùsgadh

displayName.french: Maîtrise de la plongée en saturation
displayName.japanese: 標準評価試験 ダイバー完全習得

description.english: Thoroughly explore the trench valley
description.german: Den Graben gründlich absuchen
description.french: Explorez minutieusement la fosse
description.italian: Esplora completamente la fossa
description.spanish: Explora la fosa marina de cabo a rabo
description.schinese: 彻底探索海沟谷底
description.tchinese: 徹底探索海溝谷
description.japanese: 海溝の谷を徹底的に探索する
description.brazilian: Explore bem o vale da fossa
